channel.title: 508 Run error?
channel.description:
When i try to run my 508 (bulby) I get this: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bulby/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Bulby.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)[/code]
Here is my run.bat code: [code]@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe" Bulby/Server 43594 pause[/code]
And in the folder "Bulby" there is a file called "Server.bat"
So what do i do?

item.title: 508 Run error?
item.dc:creator: @public_boolean public boolean
item.description:
@public_boolean wrote:

Ok, before running the server compile it first, try that.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Run error?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I have both.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 01:27:41 pm[/size][hr]There, changed it to this:

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe" Bulby/Server 43594 pause

And it says this!

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bulby/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Bulby.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:276) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319) Press any key to continue . . . [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 01:32:39 pm[/size][hr]Fixrd it, now it says this:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bulby\Server Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Run error?
item.dc:creator: @public_boolean public boolean
item.description:
@public_boolean wrote:

I’s recommend you download JDk, not JRE.

Read full topic
